summary: In France in the darkest days of the Great War Camille receives an alarming letter from her soldier boyfriend. Disguising herself as a man she sets off to try and find him. As she lives ... See full summary »
cast: Sylvie Testud|Pascal Greggory|Guillaume Verdier|François Négret|Laurent Talon|Pierre Léon|Benjamin Esdraffo|Didier Brice|Laurent Lacotte|Bob Boisadan|Lionel Turchi|Laurent Valéro|Michel Fossiez|Jean-Christophe Bouvet|Emmanuel Levaufre|Cécile Reigher|Philippe Chemin|Mehdi Zannad|Vincent Fraiscinet|Pascale Bodet|Guillaume Depardieu
title: La France
